def_cn: 动员;鼓动;召集；（人们）动员起来
def_en: If you mobilize support or mobilize people to do something, you succeed in encouraging people to take action, especially political action. If people mobilize, they prepare to take action.
If you mobilize resources, you start to use them or make them available for use.

def_cn: (国家或军队)动员起来;动员(军队)
def_en: If a country mobilizes, or mobilizes its armed forces, or if its armed forces mobilize, they are given orders to prepare for a conflict.
